name: Deploy to EKS (Multi-Service)

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout Code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Configure AWS Credentials
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v2
        with:
          aws-access-key-id: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}
          aws-secret-access-key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}
          aws-region: ${{ secrets.AWS_REGION }}

      - name: Login to Amazon ECR
        id: login-ecr
        run: |
          aws ecr get-login-password --region ${{ secrets.AWS_REGION }} | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin ${{ secrets.ECR_REPOSITORY }}

      # Build and Push Service 1
      - name: Build and Push Service 1
        run: |
          docker build -t service-1 ./service-1
          docker tag service-1:latest ${{ secrets.ECR_REPOSITORY }}/service-1:latest
          docker push ${{ secrets.ECR_REPOSITORY }}/service-1:latest

      # Build and Push Service 2
      - name: Build and Push Service 2
        run: |
          docker build -t service-2 ./service-2
          docker tag service-2:latest ${{ secrets.ECR_REPOSITORY }}/service-2:latest
          docker push ${{ secrets.ECR_REPOSITORY }}/service-2:latest

      - name: Update kubeconfig for EKS
        run: |
          aws eks update-kubeconfig --region ${{ secrets.AWS_REGION }} --name ${{ secrets.EKS_CLUSTER_NAME }}

      - name: Deploy to EKS (Service 1)
        run: |
          kubectl apply -f service-1/k8s/deployment.yaml
          kubectl apply -f service-1/k8s/service.yaml

      - name: Deploy to EKS (Service 2)
        run: |
          kubectl apply -f service-2/k8s/deployment.yaml
          kubectl apply -f service-2/k8s/service.yaml
